<h3 id="X13587">X(13587)&nbsp;=&nbsp; EULER LINE INTERCEPT OF THE LINE X(36)X(100)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a(3a<sup>3</sup> - 3ab<sup>2</sup>  - 3ac<sup>2</sup> + b<sup>2</sup>c + bc<sup>2</sup> + abc) : :
<b><br>
X(13587) = 2 X[36] + X[100] = 2 X[214] + X[484] = 4 X[1319] - X[1320] = X[20] + 2 X[1532] = 2 X[3814] + X[4316] = 2 X[1155] + X[4511] = 4 X[3035] - X[5080] = X[3218] - 4 X[5122] = 2 X[5122] + X[5440] = X[3218] + 2 X[5440] = X[3583] - 4 X[6681] = 7 X[3523] - X[6840] = 5 X[631] - 2 X[6882] = 2 X[3] + X[6905] = 4 X[3] - X[6909] = 2 X[6905] + X[6909] = 8 X[3911] + X[9963] = X[6265] + 2 X[10225]
</b>
<p>
X(13587) lies on these lines:
{1,9352}, {2,3}, {8,5204}, {10,5303}, {35,551}, {36,100}, {40,5330}, {55,4345}, {56,3241}, {78,3928}, {81,4256}, {165,3877}, {214,484}, {517,4881}, {524,5096}, {528,5172}, {529,4996}, {574,5276}, {597,4265}, {644,1055}, {758,5131}, {896,5529}, {1155,4511}, {1210,11015}, {1319,1320}, {1420,3885}, {1470,11239}, {1621,5010}, {2078,13279}, {2975,3679}, {3035,5080}, {3218,5122}, {3361,3889}, {3582,10090}, {3583,6681}, {3616,4428}, {3655,11491}, {3814,4316}, {3825,4324}, {3828,5260}, {3829,5433}, {3833,5426}, {3868,4855}, {3876,3929}, {3895,13462}, {3897,7987}, {3911,9963}, {4299,11681}, {4677,8666}, {4745,5258}, {5193,13278}, {5251,9342}, {5362,10646}, {5367,10645}, {5691,7705}, {6265,10225}, {9782,11281}
</p>

X(13587) = reflection of X(10707) in X(3582)<br>
X(13587) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2,376,11114), (2,11112,6175), (3,404,21), (3,474,4189), (3,4188,404), (3,4191,4216), (3,6905,6909), (3,6911,6950), (3,6924,6906), (3,6940,6986), (3,6942,411), (20,6921,4193), (56,4421,3241), (140,2475,7504), (404,5047,474), (474,4189,5047), (549,11112,2), (631,4190,2476), (3241,4421,3871), (4189,5047,21), (4203,9909,8654), (4652,5438,3876), (5122,5440,3218), (6880,6948,6932), (6885,6977,6828), (6904,6910,4197), (6906,6924,6915), (6911,6950,6912), (6934,6961,6943), (6938,6970,6945)<br>
